actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of middle distillates from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 4).

summary.text: Disapproves the Federal Energy Administration's proposed energy action numbered 4 which would exempt middle distillates (other than number 2 heating oil and number 2-D diesel fuel) from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of middle distillates from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (energy action No. 4).
